content: this pattern is for a dragon egg or pinecone pouch measuring approximately 7 x 7 when made with worsted weight yarn and a size g hook it is made using a crocodile stitch over a solid background that keeps dice or other small items from falling out this stitch requires a lot of yarn especially with the solid background plan on using an entire 6 oz skein of yarn i ve posted a separate pattern for making a similar bag using thread or a larger bag using yarn
